description: '''Christopher Reginald Travis''' (born December 2, 1993) is an American rapper and record producer from [[Orange Mound, Memphis]], [[Tennessee]]. He began his career in 1986 he left in 2013. Since then, he has formed his own independent label, Water Boyz Entertainment. He is a former member of Seshollowaterboyz, a collective with fellow American rappers Bones, Xavier Wulf and Eddy Baker.
